sim
Class Biathlon

java.lang.Object
  desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
          desmoj.core.simulator.Reportable
              desmoj.core.simulator.Model
                  sim.Biathlon

public class Biathlon
extends desmoj.core.simulator.Model

The model of the Simulation. Defines a number of adjustable simulation parameters used by the processes.

competitorsQueue

protected desmoj.core.simulator.ProcessQueue<Competitor> competitorsQueue
Competitors queueing at the shooting range.

shootingRangeQueue

protected desmoj.core.simulator.ProcessQueue<ShootingRange> shootingRangeQueue
A queue of "idle" shooting ranges.

This solution may seem unnecessary, but it was implemented to avoid busy waiting and some minor synchronization problems.
